title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7537 (November 22nd, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update Version: 4.0.7537
Released on: November 22nd, 2013




Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary 

[H] Leveling
Dustwallow Marsh:
Added player tips
Fixed a guide step that was auto-completing
Added waypoints for additional quest mobs

Thousand Needles:
Fixed guide text that was too long and getting cut off
Added extra waypoints for better navigation between quests
Fixed a typo in the guide that caused a step to auto-complete
Added waypoints for extra quest mobs
Fixed a step that wasn't working correctly
Added tips for boss fight mechanics
Added general tips

[A] Leveling
Howling Fjord:
Fixed minor NPC display issues
Fixed a reported typo in the guide

[A] Professions
Inscription Guide:
Adjusted numbers of gathered herbs to reflect the number you need.
Fixed a router in the MoP Herbalism guide that didn't work properly.
